mapper.sql: id, permission_name, permission_code, permission_type, resource_type, resource_id, description, status, created_at, updated_at
mapper.select: SELECT FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_type, id
SELECT p.* FROM permissions p INNER JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.permission_type, p.id

SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM permissions p INNER JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.permission_type, p.id
mapper.update: UPDATE permissions SET permission_name = #{permissionName}, permission_code = #{permissionCode}, permission_type = #{permissionType}, resource_type = #{resourceType}, resource_id = #{resourceId}, description = #{description}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
